column4: hello all, online instruction to recover grub are totally useless, as the ubuntu live cd has no program "grub" in terminal. any thoughts for how i can reinstall gruB?
Which version of Ubuntu you on?
ok 9.04 comes with the old Grub
tried those instructions. "grub" doesn't do shit in a live cd terminal
any thoughts for how to install the old grub? the instructions indicate that "grub" should work at a terminal in the live cd, but this is not the case at all
uhmm you said your on 9.04?
correct
that means you have the old version of Grub installed
agreed.
you don't have Grub 2, unless you installed it yourself of course
with you
I'm on that article, it is useless
It says to put in the live cd, open terminal, type grub. that third step does nothing
what is the problem with Grub?
when i reinstalled windows 7, i simply lost it
ah right yeah
if you install Windows after a Linux distro, it will overwrite the boot loader
and then WIndows only boots up
exactly. so how do i get grub back?
I guess since Microsoft don't like other OS's much
